325:1: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārakaḥ tatpuṇyatoyaṃ saṃbhāvayan,
325:11: anupūrveṇa yena siṃhapotaṃ nagaraṃ tenopasaṃkramya ratnacūḍaṃ dharmaśreṣṭhinaṃ parimārgamāṇo'drākṣīdantarāpaṇamadhyagatam|
325:12: tasya pādau śirasābhivandya pradakṣiṇīkṛtya purataḥ prāñjaliḥ sthitvā evamāha-mayā ārya anuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau cittamutpāditam|
325:13: na ca jānāmi kathaṃ bodhisattvena bodhisattvacaryāyāṃ śikṣitavyam,
325:17: atha khalu ratnacūḍo dharmaśreṣṭhī sudhanaṃ śreṣṭhidārakaṃ pāṇau gṛhītvā yena svaṃ niveśanaṃ tenopasaṃkramya tadgṛhamupadarśya evamāha-prekṣasva kulaputra mama niveśanam|
325:18: so'nuvilokayan adrākṣīttadgṛhaṃ śuddhaṃ prabhāsvaraṃ jāmbūnadasuvarṇamayaṃ vipulamudviddhaṃ rūpyaprākāraparikṣiptaṃ sphaṭikaprāsādasukṛtopaśobhitaṃ vaiḍūryakūṭaśatasahasrapratimaṇḍitaṃ musāragalvasamucchritastambhaṃ suprajñaptaṃ lohitamuktāmayasiṃhāsanaṃ jyotīrasamaṇiratnasiṃhadhvajasamuchritaṃ vairocanamaṇiratnavitānavitataṃ cintāmaṇivicitrahemajālasaṃchannamasaṃkhyeyamaṇiratnapratimaṇḍitavyūhaṃ śītajalāśmagarbhamayapuṣkariṇīsamupetaṃ sarvaratnadrumaparivṛtaṃ vipulaṃ vistīrṇaṃ daśapuramudviddhamaṣṭadvāram|
325:24: pañcame pure pañcamībhūmipratiṣṭhitānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ dharmasaṃgītiratiprayuktānāṃ lokahitasukhacittaceṣṭānāṃ sarvaśāstrāṇyabhinirhārayatāṃ dhāraṇīnayaṃ ca samādhisamudraṃ ca samādhivyutthānaṃ ca samādhivyavacāraṃ ca jñānālokaṃ ca abhinirhārayatāṃ saṃnipātamadrākṣīt|
325:25: ṣaṣṭhe pure prajñāpāramitāvihārapratilabdhānāṃ gambhīraprajñānāṃ sarvadharmapraśāntābhijñānāṃ bhūmisamādhidhāraṇīmukhagarbhasamantamukhaniryātānām anāvaraṇagocarāṇām advayasamudācārāṇāṃ dharmasaṃgītiṃ kurvatāṃ prajñāpāramitāparivartanamanusaratāṃ vibhajatāmuttānī kurvatāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃnipātamadrākṣīt imāni prajñāpāramitāmukhāni saṃgāyatām-yaduta śāntigarbhaṃ nāma prajñāpāramitāmukham,
325:39: itīmāni prajñāpāramitāmukhāni pramukhaṃ kṛtvā paripūrṇāni daśa prajñāpāramitāsaṃkhyeyaśatasahasrāṇi,
325:42: aṣṭame pure'cyutagāminyabhijñāpratilabdhānāṃ sarvalokadhātvanuvicaraṇānāṃ sarvaparṣanmaṇḍalapratibhāsaprāptānāṃ sarvadharmadhātusuvibhaktaśarīrāṇāṃ sarvatathāgatapādamūlāsaṃbhinnaviṣayāṇāṃ sarvabuddhakāyasamavasaraṇānāṃ sarvatathāgataparṣanmaṇḍalapūrvagamakathāpuruṣāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ saṃnipātamadrākṣīt|
325:44: daśame pure sarvatathāgatānāṃ saprathamopacittotpādacaryāniryāṇapraṇidhānasāgarān sarvabuddhadharmavikurvitaviṣayān sarvabuddhakṣetraparṣanmaṇḍalān sarvabuddhadharmacakranirghoṣān sarvasattvavinayādhiṣṭhānavyūhānadrākṣīt||
325:47: kutra te kuśalamūlānyavaropitāni yasya tava iyamīdṛśī vipākasaṃpat?
325:48: sa āha-smarāmi kulaputra atīte'dhvani buddhakṣetraparamāṇurajaḥsamānāṃ kalpānāṃ pareṇa paratareṇa cakravicitre lokadhātāvanantaraśmidharmadhātusamalaṃkṛtadharmarājo nāma tathāgato loke udapādi,
325:49: vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavidanuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān|
325:50: sa khalu punastathāgato jñānavairocanapramukhena śrāvakakoṭīśatena jñānasūryatejaḥpramukhena ca bodhisattvakoṭīśatasahasreṇa sārdhaṃ maṇidhvajavyūharājamahodyānadharaṇipraviṣṭo rājñā dharmeśvararājena abhinimantritaḥ|
325:51: tasya me tathāgatasya nagarapraviṣṭasyāntarāpaṇamadhyagatasya tūryanādanirnāditaṃ kāritam|
325:52: ekā ca gandhagulikā nidhūpitā tasya bhagavataḥ sabodhisattvaśrāvakasaṃghasya pūjākarmaṇe|
325:53: tayā ca gandhagulikayā nidhūpitayā saptāhaṃ sarvajambudvīpo'nantavarṇaiḥ sarvasattvakāyasadṛśairdhūpapaṭalameghaiḥ saṃchanno'bhūt|
325:54: tebhyaśca dhūpapaṭalameghebhya evaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścarati sma-aciantyastathāgatatryadhvavipulena skandhena samanvāgataḥ,
325:58: tebhyo dhūpapaṭalameghebhyo buddhādhiṣṭhānena ayamevaṃrūpaḥ śabdo niścacāra|
325:59: tacca me kulaputra tathāgatādhiṣṭhānaṃ saṃdarśanaprātihāryakuśalamūlaṃ triṣu sthāneṣu pariṇāmitam|
325:64: kiṃ mayā śakyamacintyāpramāṇaguṇaratnākarāṇāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ caryāṃ jñātuṃ guṇān vā vaktum,
325:69: ye te asaṃbhinnasamādhiviṣayāvatīrṇāḥ ye te asaṃbhinnasarvabodhisattvaikaghanakuśalamūlāḥ ye te asaṃbhinnatathāgatāvikalpavihāriṇaḥ,
325:75: tatra samantamukhe nagare samantanetro nāma gāndhikaḥ śreṣṭhī prativasati|
325:78: atha khalu sudhanaḥ śreṣṭhidārako ratnacūḍasya dharmaśreṣṭhinaḥ pādau śirasābhivandya ratnacūḍaṃ dharmaśreṣṭhinamanekaśatasahasrakṛtvaḥ pradakṣiṇīkṛutya punaḥ punaravalokya ratnacūḍasya dharmaśreṣṭhino'ntikātprakrāntaḥ||16||
